name: C1ic Derby Steeplechase
description:
Another one button game.

Like my other projects, this is a very simple game that can be played with a single button, but this one is multiplayer

Use left mouse button to start.

Other players - Arrow keys or space bar, key for player

Press button at the right time jump.

Another game for the list of c1ic.mx "Tiny arcade"

If you want to play the original game or play all the games go directly to http://c1ic.mx/arcade/
